Marriage ruling Myrtle Beach serves as a family-friendly destination for all budgets 
MYRTLE BEACH, S.C. — Almost everyone thinks they know this popular beach town — even me, although I hadn’t visited in 25 years. Already a Digital D subscriber? Login Hi,
